page.title: 14A Saturday on the Farm (2)
page.content: but he comes in around four o'clock for tea.After tea we get the cows in. We stay to help by driving the cows in for about half an hour then we go in.We sometimes watch a bit of television and then if there is time left before we have to go to bed we go to see what Dad is doing.If we can we help him feed the cows by putting the cake in the bucket and emptying it into the trough.We have three cows named Sharon,Rachael and Anne after us girls.They have all had calves and these calves and cows are our favourites.After the cows have been milked we all help let the cows out into the field.After that we go back home except Dad because he stays to check everything is alright.Then we go to bed.Sometimes we read before we go to sleep but we are usually tired by the time Saturday night comes.
